Blinded

Source: XPHB, page 361

While you have the Blinded condition, you experience the following effects. You can't see and automatically fail any ability check that requires sight.Attack|XPHB rolls against you have Advantage|XPHB, and your attack rolls have Disadvantage|XPHB.
